Code:
EXEC SQL  SELECT CODUSU
FROM seguros.v0relatorios
 
WHERE     IDSISTEM     = :IDSISTEM
AND       CODRELAT     = :CODRELAT
AND       NUM_APOLICE  = :NUM_APOLICE
AND       NRENDOS      = :NRENDOS
AND      (NRPARCEL     = :NRPARCEL
 OR       NRPARCEL     =  99)
AND       SITUACAO     = :SITUACAO
/
 END SQL
